flag.h2o

Physical properties of H2O.

flag.h2o.bulk_modulus(P: FVec, T: FVec, model: str = 'rpl')

Bulk modulus of pure water [GPa].

Application conditions:

  1. Pressure [MPa] : 0 <= P <= 200

  2. Temperature [C] : 0 <= T <= 300

Parameters:

  • P (TFVec) – Pressure [MPa]

  • T (TFVec) – Temperature [C]

  • model (str) – Model used to calculate bulk modulus. Defaults to ‘rpl’.

Returns:

Bulk modulus of pure water [GPa].

Return type:

TFVec

flag.h2o.density(P: FVec, T: FVec, model: str = 'rpl') → FVec

Density of pure water [g/cm^3].

Application conditions:

  1. Pressure [MPa] : 0 <= P <= 200

  2. Temperature [C] : 0 <= T <= 300

Parameters:

  • P (TFVec) – Pressure [MPa]

  • T (TFVec) – Temperature [C]

  • model (str) – Model used to calculate density. Defaults to ‘rpl’.

Returns:

Density of pure water [g/cm^3].

Return type:

TFVec

flag.h2o.gas_solubility(P: FVec, T: FVec, model: str = 'rpl')

Solubility of petroleum gas in pure water.

Application conditions:

  1. Pressure [MPa] : 6.895 <= P <= 68.948

  2. Temperature [C] : 0 <= T <= Vapor point

Parameters:

  • P (TFVec) – Pressure [MPa]

  • T (TFVec) – Temperature [C]

  • model (str) – Model used to calculate solubility. Defaults to ‘rpl’.

Returns:

Solubility of petroleum gas in pure water.

Return type:

TFVec

flag.h2o.saturated_vapor_pressure(T: FVec, model: str = 'rpl')

Saturated vapor pressure of pure water [MPa].

Application conditions:

  1. Temperature [C] : 0.01 <= T <= 373.946

Model details:
‘rpl’:

Antoine (1888)

Parameters:

  • T (TFVec) – Temperature [C]

  • model (str) – Model used to calculate saturated vapor pressure. Defaults to ‘rpl’.

Returns:

Saturated vapor pressure of pure water [MPa].

Return type:

TFVec

flag.h2o.saturated_vapor_temperature(P: FVec, model: str = 'rpl')

Saturated vapor temperature of pure water [C].

Application conditions:

  1. Pressure [MPa] : 0.0006 <= P <= 21.7175

Model details:
‘rpl’:

Antoine (1888)

Parameters:

  • P (TFVec) – Pressure [MPa]

  • model (str) – Model used to calculate saturated vapor temperature. Defaults to ‘rpl’.

Returns:

Saturated vapor temperature of pure water [C].

Return type:

TFVec

flag.h2o.velocity(P: FVec, T: FVec, model: str = 'rpl') → FVec

Velocity of pure water [km/s].

Application conditions:

  1. Pressure [MPa] : 0 <= P <= 200

  2. Temperature [C] : 0 <= T <= 300

Parameters:

  • P (TFVec) – Pressure [MPa]

  • T (TFVec) – Temperature [C]

  • model (str) – Model used to calculate velocity. Defaults to ‘rpl’.

Returns:

Velocity of pure water [km/s].

Return type:

TFVec

flag.h2o.viscosity(T: FVec, model: str = 'rpl')

Viscosity of pure water [cP].

Application conditions:

  1. Pressure [MPa] : 0 <= P <= 200

  2. Temperature [C] : 0 <= T <= 300

Model details:

From Kestin et al. (1981)

Parameters:

  • T (TFVec) – Temperature [C]

  • model (str) – Model used to calculate viscosity. Defaults to ‘rpl’.

Returns:

Viscosity of pure water [cP].

Return type:

TFVec
